bibl.idno: Papers of Jefferson Randolph Kean [manuscript] / Jefferson Randolph Kean, 1860-1950. MSS 628. The Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va.

bibl.title: Letter from L. O. Howard to Jefferson Randolph Kean, March 12, 1925

div1.p: Howard is glad to have read the published article Kean has written for the “Military Surgeon,” and believes it is a judicial and expert summary. [Courtesy of The Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia Library]

div1.head: Letter from L. O. Howard to Jefferson Randolph Kean, March 12, 1925
div1.opener:
UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
BUREAU OF ENTOMOLOGY
WASHINGTON, D. C.
March 12, 1925.
General Jefferson B. Kean, U. S. A. (Retired),
Army Medical Museum,
Washington, D. C.
Dear General Kean:
div1.p:
I have just received the March number of the Military Surgeon
containing the admirable editorial about which we have corresponded. I
am very glad to have this printed copy of your judicial and expert sum-
mary of these things. I am sure that you have been perfectly fair.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, L. O. Howard Chief of Bureau.
loh-wft
